dmca.title: Artist Asks Google to Remove Links
dmca.body:
FROM : Fatara World Subitronics	PHONE NO. : xx xxxx xxxx	Jun. 25 2002 10:18AM P1

Fatara World.com
Amyd the woods & seas

Google Inc
Attn: User Support, DMCA Complaints,
[private]
Mountain View

24th June 02
	Re: Copyright Infringement Notice (#561518)

Dear Sir or Madam,

Following correspondence from your good selves, we wish to file this notice of infringement of intellectual property and herewith added to by the following in support of such claim.

The copyrighted work at issue are the images that appear on www.aaardvarksstudio.com/tubes.html and www.katznjammincouples.com/mbd/search.cgi?mbd=tube&cat=maxinegadd (also associated with www.Aaardvarksstudio.com) The images illegally used by this website so displayed in your search facility include the following: MC 7003 "Frost"; MC 7031 "Elf Baby"; MN 9002 "Cosy Moments"; MN 9001 "Humpty Dumpty" and MC 7045 "Night Journey"

The query used to discover this infringing material was 'Maxine Gadd'

We have also located the owner and administrator for the above mentioned site through www.networksolutions.com/cgi_bin/whois/whois.

REGISTRANT: [private]
	Aaardvarks	email: [private]@aaardvarksark.com
	[private]
	Palmdale, CA 93551	Phone xxx-xxx-xxxx
	USA.

REGISTRAR: Dotster (http://www.dotster.com)

Domain servers in listed order:
	Comet.hosting4less.com
	Ns2.hosting4less.com

<HR>

By way of attachment, we also provide print-outs of our search on the Google Directory and the corresponding web page received from aaardvarkastudio.com.

In conclusion, I will state that I have a good faith and belief that use of the Copyrighted materials described herein on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorised by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I hereby swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in this notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner that is allegedly infringed.

Yours Faithfully,

[private]
Copyright owner

www.fataraworld.com
email: [private]@fataraworld.com

Phone or Fax: xx xxxxxxxxx
Email: [private]@fataraworld.com
[private], Subiaco Western Australia 6008


<HR>

attachment: Google search for Maxine Gadd
	2 pages

attachment: Aaardvarks Studio Gallery pages
	3 pages
